sentences: Leroy Jenkins (March 11, 1932 â€“ February 24, 2007) was an American composer and violinist/violist.
Jenkins was born in Chicago, Illinois, United States.
Commissioned by and premiered at the 1990 Munich Biennial New Music Theatre Festival (Hans Werner Henze, artistic director).

Created in collaboration with librettist Homer Jackson and choreographer Rennie Harris (Philadelphia show), director Talvin Wilks (New York show), and conductor/music director Alan Johnson (New York show).
